JobFullDesc: In Uber for Business, we’re simplifying the way businesses move. Our engineering team solves unique challenges for both the rider and businesses, providing seamless experiences for travel managers and travelers alike. Help us bring modern ground transportation management to businesses around the globe.  About the Role The Uber for Business (U4B) mobile team is uniquely positioned to build features on the rider and uber eats app that benefit our users. Some examples of U4B features include company sponsored rides home, Uber trips given to you by your car dealer when your vehicle is being serviced, and group ordering in our Uber eats application. On the U4B Mobile team you’ll work on exciting projects across both of our eats and rider apps that unlock growth and deliver value to our business users.  The U4B team is a tight knit group of passionate and talented engineers, designers, data scientists, product managers, and account managers. We pride ourselves on our collaborative and open culture. As a mobile engineer in U4B you'll have the unique opportunity to apply technology to solve Uber’s challenges in the business world as well as have a measurable impact on the user experience of our Uber applications. What You'll DoWork on exciting features that elevate the business experience.Solve complex logistics problems in the real world with scalable technical solutions.Develop polished mobile features that deliver high user valueWork with partner teams to deliver long term shared goals.Provide technical leadership to more junior engineers on the team.Basic QualificationsHigh proficiency in iOS development2+ years of experience developing and shipping iOS code for production systemsStrong skills in system design, coding, and testingGood written, verbal communication skillsExperience with writing, releasing, and maintaining mobile featuresGreat team playerPreferred Qualifications7+ years of experience in Software DevelopmentBS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or a related fieldExperience building and maintaining iOS apps, frameworks, or SDKsExperience overseeing projects from beginning to end as a tech leadPassionate about writing high quality code and polished mobile experiencesPassionate about delivering software that delights our end users
